item.title: Sweden plans tighter gun laws after Orebro school shooting
item.description: The government says it is seeking to strengthen vetting for gun licenses and restrict access to semi-automatic weapons.

item.title: Watch horseback police chase after suspected drug dealer
item.description: Mounted police galloped after a man who fled on foot when officers approached him in Jacksonville, Florida.

item.title: US job growth slows but unemployment stays low
item.description: Firms created 143,000 jobs last month, below analysts' forecasts, but December's figure was upgraded.

item.title: Alaska authorities search for missing small plane
item.description: The craft carrying 10 people was on flight from Unalakleet to Nome when "its position was lost".

item.title: Plane crashes into bus on busy SÃ£o Paulo street
item.description: Two people were killed in the accident, the Brazilian city's fire department said.
